edu.ncsu.csc.Galant

Class GalantException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.GalantException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GalantException
extends java.lang.Exception
    A catch all for all exceptions occurring in Galant; this acts as the end of any chain of exceptions and allows the program to report the exception on the console and/or display it in a GUI window. $Id: GalantException.java 114 2015-05-08 15:21:55Z mfms $
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display()
      displays error message in a popup window; like displayStatic() but should be used during algorithm execution because the exception results in algorithm termination
      void displayStatic()
      displays error message in a dialog popup with option to view stack trace
      void report() 
      void report(java.lang.String message)
